thread.section_title: Archive News & Video for Tuesday, 13 Feb 2018 | Reuters.com
thread.title: Diamondback Energy Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.16

author: Reuters Editorial
title: Diamondback Energy Q4 Earnings Per Share $1.16
text:
Feb 13 (Reuters) - Diamondback Energy Inc:
* DIAMONDBACK ENERGY, INC. ANNOUNCES FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS; INITIATING DIVIDEND
* Q4 EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.16 * Q4 REVENUE $399 MILLION * Q4 ADJUSTED NON-GAAP EARNINGS PER SHARE $1.56
* FULL YEAR 2018 PRODUCTION GUIDANCE OF 108.0 - 116.0 MBOE/D
* SEES FULL YEAR 2018 CAPEX GUIDANCE OF $1,300 - $1,500 MILLION
* INITIATING ANNUAL CASH DIVIDEND OF $0.50 PER COMMON SHARE TO BE PAYABLE QUARTERLY BEGINNING WITH Q1 2018
* Q4 2017 PRODUCTION OF 92.9 MBOE/D (74% OIL), UP 9% OVER Q3 2017 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
